title: Bitcoin, Ether Options' Value on Deribit Reaches Record High of $23B

title: Challenges Ahead for Solana’s Saga Phone Amid Market Realities
description: Solana Labs co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko recently expressed concerns about the future of Solana Mobile’s “Saga” phone, citing disappointing sales and changing market dynamics. In a conversation on Laura Shin’s Unchained podcast, Yakovenko deliberated on the viability of continuing with the device, which has struggled to meet sales expectations. title: MIT Researchers Develop Automated System to Teach Users When to Collaborate with AI Assistants
description: MIT researchers, in collaboration with the MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab, have developed an innovative automated system that aims to address a critical question in human-AI collaboration: When should users trust the advice of an AI assistant? This system offers a customized onboarding process that assists users in determining when to rely on AI recommendations and ... Read more

title: Securing Military Realities with Machine Learning – A Glimpse into Normative Challenges
description: In a recent exploration of the normativity of state-sanctioned killing, the utilization of machine learning in U.S. military intelligence products emerges as a pivotal point of contention. Beyond the technical and ethical debates, an institutional obstacle comes to light, challenging the foundational purpose of the military. This exploration delves into the complex landscape where civilian ... Read more

title: Ethereum Whale banks $78 Million profit from $11 Million investment
description: According to cryptocurrency research firm LookonChain, an Ethereum (ETH) whale may sell its assets after lying dormant for five years. From June to August 2017, the whale received 47,260 ETH, worth $11.34 million. The whale’s average cost per coin was roughly $240. Since 2017, the price of ETH has increased by roughly 838%. According to ... Read more

title: Binance’s Changpeng Zhao barred from leaving U.S. ahead of sentencing
description: A federal judge ruled on Dec. 9 that Changpeng Zhao must remain in the U.S. until his sentencing on criminal charges related to anti-money laundering violations. The latest decision overturns an earlier ruling by a magistrate judge that would have…

title: Solana outpaces Ethereum layer-2s in trading volume; whales turn to AI altcoin
description: Solana is outpacing Ethereum layer-2s like Polygon in trading volume as whales shift their attention to InQubeta and the QUBE presale

title: Fancy a ‘Freedom Visa’? El Salvador has you covered
